sentence: Cleanliness is certainly a main focus of the entire team with great attention to detail
Our suite you walk right into the front living area with LG LED TV sectional chaise and a desk with work area of course wifi
Friendly staff great location
Dependable quality and service
Really nice rooms helpful staff
We utilized multiple rooms that needed to be changed more than once temperature in the room changes and AV and the staff was very attentive and ready to help
2 hour managers welcoming each night which included drinks and food plus breakfast with omelet station each morningthe service was great and the staff made the difference in so many ways
Friendly staff yummy free breakfast nice room Wish internet was free and parking
The hotel has great amenities given the complimentary make to order breakfast and managers reception where you can have free drinks
Hotel staff was very accommodating
Wi Fi would not connect for us either but we were not therelong enough to complain to the desk about it
I told the front desk gal that I had a long trip checked into my room
The main desk truly is on the 4th floor
in so we had called the front desk to say that we were coming and when we were going to check in

Breakfast was nice two things some fresh veggies would have been nice and the staff cleared away the tables too fast I went to get something like more coffee and got back to the table to find it cleared away with someone else already seated

I am docking the hotel one star for generally slow service and one star for the ineptitude and attitude of the valets who may not be under the hotels direct control but whose treatment of their guests reflects poorly on the hotel
The Managers Reception was a joke
Front desk lady was unhelpful with getting my stay put on my Hilton Honors membership
Two kids and front desk said they only could find 1 pillow and one very thin blanket
Do not expect the front desk to assist you
